Uses of Interface
jakarta.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest

Packages that use HttpServletRequest
Package Description
cloud.piranha.cdi.weld  
cloud.piranha.embedded
This package delivers you with an embeddable Servlet container that hosts only a single application without exposing an HTTP endpoint.
cloud.piranha.http.webapp  
cloud.piranha.microprofile.smallrye.health  
cloud.piranha.nano
Piranha Nano is the smallest in our lineup and it delivers you with a very opinionated partial embeddable implementation of a Servlet container.
cloud.piranha.security.eleos  
cloud.piranha.security.exousia  
cloud.piranha.security.jakarta  
cloud.piranha.security.soteria  
cloud.piranha.webapp.api
The Piranha Web Application API package contains the core set of APIs of Piranha that deliver web application support.
cloud.piranha.webapp.impl  
jakarta.servlet.http
The jakarta.servlet.http package delivers the HTTP part of the Servlet API.

  • Uses of HttpServletRequest in cloud.piranha.cdi.weld

    Classes in cloud.piranha.cdi.weld that implement HttpServletRequest
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    class  RealtimeHttpServletRequestWrapper
    An HttpServletRequest wrapper that consistently consults the getWrapped() method for every operation.
    class  WeldHttpServletRequest
    An HttpServletRequest wrapper that always delegates every operation to what has been set as the current request.
    Methods in cloud.piranha.cdi.weld that return HttpServletRequest
    Modifier and Type Method Description
